question: ./img/easy_q1.jpg
hint: This artist was commissioned by the civic militia to create ‘The Night Watch’.

question: ./img/easy_q2.jpg
hint: This artist was deeply inspired by Edgar Degas’ work and was one of the first women to exhibit her work at the Paris Salon.

question: ./img/easy_q3.jpg
hint: This artist is most famous for ‘The Untitled Series’, a series of photographs reminiscent of the Italian neorealism or American film noir.

question: ./img/easy_q4.jpg
hint: This artist is famous for making stainless steel sculptures of balloon animals.

question: ./img/easy_q5.jpg
hint: This artist has created the most famous portrait ever made.
